## Highlights

```{=typst}
#v(1em)
```
-   New York State's [Gaming Facility Location Board](https://nycasinos.ny.gov/) seems highly likely to approve 3 new casino licenses by December 1, 2025 and license the winners by December 31, 2025.

-   All 3 will be in New York City outside Manhattan. See table below.

-   License fee and tax revenue will depend upon structures agreed upon by the GFLB and each casino, separately. The statute sets out minimum requirements:

-

    ```
    One-time license fee of at least $500 million per casino
    ```

-

    ```
    Ongoing revenue at tax rates of at least 25% for
    ```
